mapper.sql: id, open_id, city, hometown_city, country, gender, language, nick_name, province, hometown_province, school, age, birth, height, weight, constellation, work_status, degree, wechat_id, phone, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where city= #{city}
SELECT city as field, count(*) as num FROM user GROUP BY city
select age as field, count(*) as num FROM user GROUP BY age
select gender as field, count(*) as num from user GROUP BY gender
select work_status as field,count(*) as num from user GROUP BY work_status
